nawa thakshanaya rata thulata genaeema sandaha rajaya me wana wita lowa diyunu ratawal rasak samanga giwisum walata elambaa athi bawa janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha pawasayi.pasugiyada thaman jarmaniye saha ostriyawe sidukala sancharayedi ema ratawala usas thakshana danuma shri lankawata labaganimata saha ema ratawal samanga adhyapana huwamaru wadasatahan kriyathmaka kirimata adala giwisum kihipayakata athsan thabu bawada janadhipathiwaraya sandahan kaleya.malambae thorathuru thakshana wishwawidyalaye warshika thyaga pradhanothsawayata ekwemin janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha mema adahas pala kara thibe.rate daruwan nawa thakshana danumen saha adhyapanayen sannaddha kirimen owunta heta lokaya jayaganima sadaha ida prasthawa wiwara kara dena bawa janadhipathiwaraya ehidi wadiduratath sandahan kaleya.
